trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som håndterer den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen modellen i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] er basert på med en hendelse representant som kobler en hendelse med behandlingsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, two elements are needed: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: Opphøye en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>hendelse, kreves det to elementer: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>klasse som er utledet fra <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>, som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: - The DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: -DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler representant som peker til en metode som gir svar på hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: When you create a DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
